name: Power Source (KovaKreative)
description:
This game is a submission for the GMTK Jam 2019, where the theme is "One".

For my interpretation of the theme, I chose to make an isometric shooter where you only have one gauge, or battery. This battery is your health, your ammo, and your stamina, so don't go firing off your weapon like Rambo, otherwise you'll drain your health and that's a surefire way to die quickly.
